ComicInfo.Summary: For months, since the murder of his family, Jeff Carey has known only loneliness, despair, and anger. But now, he's found an ally--someone who may be able to help him find answers about the past they share. But while they seek the truth, the last criminal that was touched by the man once called Paragon hunts them. As the conspiracy begins to coalesce, it becomes apparent that Melanie--Jeff's only companion for many months--may hold the key to everything.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-03 07:49:52. [CVDB337275]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Dreamer Design, Robin Spehar, Troy Peteri
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Dave Ross, Jeremy Roberts, Mike Norton
